text: Keijo Erik Rosberg (; born 6 December 1948), known as "Keke", is a Finnish former racing driver and winner of the Formula One World Championship. He was the first Finnish driver to compete regularly in the series. Rosberg grew up in Oulu and Iisalmi, Finland. He is the father of retired Formula One driver and Formula One world champion Nico Rosberg. ==Reference== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish racecar drivers Category:Formula One drivers
title: Keke Rosberg
